EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-04-15-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Philadelphia.Marketing Invitation 3.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: See you in Philadelphia?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-philadelphia]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Meet your fellow IT leaders on April 5th at the Wells Fargo Center for an evening of food, drinks and hockey as Claude Giroux and the Philadelphia Flyers take on Noah Hanifin and the Carolina Hurricanes in the Turbonomic suite. Join your peers for a good time to network, share challenges, and discuss strategies in managing complex hybrid cloud landscapes. Will we see you there?
Philadelpia Executive Networking event Philadelphia Flyers vs Carolina Hurricanes Thursday, April 5th | Wells Fargo Center | 6:30 p.m.
<[[http://turbonomic.com/vip-philadelphia]]>
Save your seat and RSVP here - http://turbonomic.com/vip-philadelphia <[[turbonomic.com/philadelphia]]>
Sincerely,
The Turbonomic Team
